member.name: RM_APP_STATUS
member.summary: Describes the current status of an application that is acted upon by the Restart Manager.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusUnknown
member.summary: The application is in a state that is not described by any other enumerated state.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusStopped
member.summary: The Restart Manager has stopped the application.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusStoppedOther
member.summary: An action outside the Restart Manager has stopped the application.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusRestarted
member.summary: The Restart Manager has restarted the application.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusErrorOnStop
member.summary: The Restart Manager encountered an error when stopping the application.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusErrorOnRestart
member.summary: The Restart Manager encountered an error when restarting the application.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusShutdownMasked
member.summary: Shutdown is masked by a filter.

member.name: RM_APP_STATUS.RmStatusRestartMasked
member.summary: Restart is masked by a filter.
